Posted By: Acefox17 (3/8/2010 8:50:56 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Beautiful artwork, terrific card. Should be in virtually any deck, especially in Standard Format.
  
   
The only thing that keeps it from being unbalanced is that the Cloak itself can be targeted... Beware of opponents with instants that destroy like [Disenchant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Disenchant) or [Shatter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shatter), as they may wait for you to attack and then kill your guy once he is exposed.
  
   
Some obvious combos have already been mentioned, but virtually any creature effect on damage is a sure-fire win. Heavy duty guys can kill quickly, [Hypnotic Specter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hypnotic Specter) can discard at will... life is good.
  
   
4.5/5
posts.html:
Beautiful artwork, terrific card. Should be in virtually any deck, especially in Standard Format.

The only thing that keeps it from being unbalanced is that the Cloak itself can be targeted... Beware of opponents with instants that destroy like Disenchant or Shatter, as they may wait for you to attack and then kill your guy once he is exposed.

Some obvious combos have already been mentioned, but virtually any creature effect on damage is a sure-fire win. Heavy duty guys can kill quickly, Hypnotic Specter can discard at will... life is good.

4.5/5
